long_description: A cool-weather running staple, the ASICS PR(TM) pants boost your comfort thanks to an incredibly soft, brushed fabric that wicks moisture and dries quickly. Quick-drying brushed fabric provides temperature-regulating breathability, moisture wicking and lightweight insulation during long runs. Zippered pockets hand store essentials; security pocket stashes a key. Elastic drawcord waist personalizes the fit. Locking ankle zippers offer easy dressing over shoes; reflective elements keep you visible when running in low light. The semifitted ASICS PR pants are not too loose and not too tight.
short_description: A cool-weather running staple, the ASICS PR(TM) pants boost your comfort thanks to an incredibly soft, brushed fabric that wicks moisture and dries quickly.
